Room.Name: Lelion Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Lelion Way, south of the Shrine of Yondalla.
Room.LongDescription: The Shrine of Yondalla is on the north side of the road. Yondalla is one of the primary dieties of the halfling culture. Most hobbits are quite religious and visit the temple at least once a week. Wakarimasu Park is located to the south.
